criterion: Reward for accurately documenting all patient-reported symptoms, side-effects, comparisons, and contextual factors exactly as expressed in the transcript.
Reward for faithfully capturing every clinician statement regarding assessment, monitoring, counseling, and plan (e.g., reassurance, time course, dose/timing adjustment, taking medication with food).

Reward for selectively and accurately integrating only chart details that are clearly relevant to today’s encounter (demographics, existing diagnosis, current medication) while omitting unrelated chart data.
Reward for overall completeness and structural fidelity of the note, with no clinically important content from the transcript omitted or misplaced.
Penalize for omission or distortion of any clinically pertinent fact explicitly stated or reasonably implied in the transcript.
Penalize for addition of information, assessments, instructions, orders, or diagnoses not supported by the transcript or relevant chart context.
Penalize for factual inaccuracies in transcribing spoken or chart information, such as wrong medication name, dose, symptom severity, or clinician recommendations.
Penalize for inclusion of irrelevant or bulk-copied chart elements that were not discussed and do not inform the current encounter.
